mapper.select: SELECT po.purchase_order_id, po.store_id, po.shoes_id, po.quantity, store.store_id, store.store_name, s.shoes_name, s.shoes_price, s.size, s.shoes_type_id, s.brand_id, st.shoes_type, b.brand_name FROM tbl_purchase_order po JOIN tbl_store store ON po.store_id = store.store_id JOIN tbl_shoes s ON po.shoes_id = s.shoes_id JOIN tbl_shoes_type st ON s.shoes_type_id = st.shoes_type_id JOIN tbl_brand b ON s.brand_id = b.brand_id ORDER BY po. purchase_order_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
